name: Little Alien Man Runs from the Government
name_original: Little Alien Man Runs from the Government
description:
Title: Little Alien Man Runs from the Government

Platform: PC Game 

Genre: Platformer 

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: Play as a little alien boy running from the government. 

Instructions: Press UP to Jump and RETURN to reset the level after failure.

Game Design Team 

Zachery Adams– Game Designer
